DryRun.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request, and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation. Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

Filters.description: One or more filters. Supported filters: volume-id, modification-state, target-size, target-iops, target-volume-type, original-size, original-iops, original-volume-type, start-time.

MaxResults.description: The maximum number of results (up to a limit of 500) to be returned in a paginated request.

NextToken.description: The nextToken value returned by a previous paginated request.

VolumeIds.description: One or more volume IDs for which in-progress modifications will be described.
